sentences.en: a sexual partner
sentences.cn: 性伴侣

sentences.en: Are you sure you want him as your partner for life?
sentences.cn: 你决定要他做你的终生伴侣 吗 ?

sentences.en: Clare’s my tennis partner.
sentences.cn: 克莱尔是我的网球搭档。

sentences.en: Come to the New Year disco and bring your partner!
sentences.cn: 携伴来参加新年迪斯科舞会吧！

sentences.en: Discuss your worries with your partner.
sentences.cn: 和伴侣谈谈你的忧虑。

sentences.en: Divorce is never the fault of one partner; it takes two.
sentences.cn: 离婚从来都不是一方的错误：双方都有责任。

sentences.en: Do you expect your partner to anticipate your needs?
sentences.cn: 你是否期望你的伴侣不等你提出就主动满足你的需要？

sentences.en: George ignored his partner's infidelities.
sentences.cn: 乔治对伴侣的不忠行为视而不见。

sentences.en: Hansen and his partner were fired for insubordination.
sentences.cn: 汉森和他的搭档因为不服从上级安排被解雇了。

sentences.en: He cast a sly glance at his bridge partner.
sentences.cn: 他向桥牌搭档使了个会意的眼色.

sentences.en: He had all the qualities I was looking for in a partner.
sentences.cn: 他具有我要找的伴侣应该具备的所有品质。

sentences.en: He is now co-partner in a new property company.
sentences.cn: 他现在是一家新房地产公司的合伙人。

sentences.en: I used to partner him in tennis matches.
sentences.cn: 我过去常在网球比赛中与他搭档。

sentences.en: Is this a rational thing to expect of your partner, or not?
sentences.cn: 指望你的伴侣做这件事合理吗？

sentences.en: Many men still have difficulty accepting a woman as a business partner.
sentences.cn: 许多男性仍然无法接受女性商业伙伴。

sentences.en: Nigeria is our principal trading partner in Africa.
sentences.cn: 尼日利亚是我们在非洲的主要贸易伙伴。

sentences.en: Only 29% of lone parents receive financial support from their former partners .
sentences.cn: 只有29%的单身家长得到他们前配偶的经济资助。

sentences.en: She flits from one dance partner to another.
sentences.cn: 她不断地换舞伴。

sentences.en: She shared the apartment with her live-in partner.
sentences.cn: 她与同居伴侣共住这一间公寓。

sentences.en: She’s a partner in a law firm.
sentences.cn: 她是一家律师事务所的合伙人。

sentences.en: Take your partners for the next dance.
sentences.cn: 挑选下一支舞的舞伴吧。

sentences.en: The house was built under the direction of John's partner.
sentences.cn: 这座房子是在约翰的合伙人的指导下盖起来的。

sentences.en: The senior partner has retired.
sentences.cn: 高级合伙人退休了。

sentences.en: Your partner should then pass the ball back to you.
sentences.cn: 然后你的搭档应该将球回传给你。

words.tran_cn: 合伙；[经管] 合伙企业；合作关系；合伙契约

phrases.tran_cn: 商业伙伴，业务合作伙伴；买卖的合伙人
n. 有限责任股东；有限责任合伙人

trans.tran_en: someone you do a particular activity with, for example dancing or playing a game against two other people
to be someone’s partner in a dance, game etc
to be someone’s partner in a dance, game etc
